38897.「この獅子門の集落は もともと\n 万が一 グレン城が 攻め滅ぼされたとき\n:
This Lion Gate Village was originally built as a base to revive Glen Castle in case it was invaded and destroyed. It may sound like a
joke now, but there was a time of such warfare.

38898.「あんた なぞの魔物の目撃談を調べてるのか？\n ちょうどよかったな。ウワサの魔:
You're looking into a mystery monster sighting? You're just in time. It was me, of all people, who saw the mythical monster. I'll
never forget it. It was a moonless, dark night. My dog was barking a lot, so I went outside the tent to check on him and found him
outside the village. It was dark, so I couldn't see him clearly, but once I saw his red eyes, which shone brightly in the
darkness, I'll never forget them. And he said in a voice that seemed to echo from the depths of the earth, "Where is Lemur's Chalice? I was
so scared I blacked out. I was so scared that I lost my mind. When I came to, he was gone. I thought I was dreaming, but the next morning I
looked and saw his big footprints were still there. It's gone now, but the footprints seemed to be heading toward Glen Castle.

38899.「あの魔物の正体は わかんねーけど\n どうやら レムルの聖杯ってモンを\n 探:
I don't know who the monster is, but it looks like he was looking for something called Lemur's Chalice. His footsteps seemed to be
heading toward Glen Castle, so maybe he was going toward the castle when you came in?

38979.「おお。あんたは ずいぶん前に\n あやしい魔物の話を聞きに\n グレン城から:
Oh. Aren't you the one who came from Glen Castle a long time ago to hear about a suspicious monster? I haven't seen that
monster since then. I'm sorry I can't help you.

42081.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「旅の方 光の: <attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Travelers, have you heard of River of Light?<yesno><break>

42082.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「光の河という:
River of Light" refers to the cracks in the earth that emit a mysterious light that extends beneath this bridge. There are similar
glowing fissures all over the world, not just here in Astoltia, and they are called the River of Light. But no one knows what this
light is or what is at the bottom of the chasm.

42083.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「そうですわね:
Yes, everyone knows that the River of Light exists, but no one knows what it is or what is at the bottom of the chasm. But no one knows
what this light is or what's at the bottom of the chasm.

53155.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「そうですわね:

112655.「そうだな……レベル１０以上の\n 踊り子になれば さすがのラスタも\n 認めて:
Yeah, you'd have to be a level 10+ dancer to
even get Rasta's approval.

112656.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr><icon_ex:
Hey! Isn't he already above level 10? Gwahahahaha! That's way too fast, no matter how you look at it. This is truly the legend
of explosive growth! I want to take you to see Rasta right away, but before I do that, I have a favor to ask. Actually, I heard something
that caught my attention the other day.

112657.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「なんでも ラス:
Rasta is not just looking for a good dancer, he is looking for someone who can dance. So I asked him what kind of guy he was looking for.
He's looking for a dancer who can beat <%nev_que_t_num0> the <%sev_que_name0> in Glen West. He was so bothered by the fact that he
had to take down a single Slime just because it blocked his way, that he was slamming the business down! Well, I don't really know why,
but if I beat him as I was told, as expected Rasta will have no choice but to accept you as his partner. So, ! Go and defeat
that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> right away. That should be a piece of cake for you, right? You'll do it, won't you?

112658.「おおっ！ さすがだぜ <pc>！ \n ただ あそこにいる <%sEV_QUE:
Oh, wow! That's what I'm talking about, !But be careful, because <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> over there is said to be a
kind of grudge. A grudge spirit is the end result of those who died with strong feelings of resentment. They don't look much different
from other spirits, but they are characterized by the fact that they attach themselves to people and do bad things to them. For some
reason, they seem to be on the rise these days. I guess it doesn't matter if you're a legendary dancer or not. But you can't be too
careful. Take care!

112659.「おおっ！ さすがだぜ <pc>！\n だが……オレのプロデューサー本能が\n:
Oh, wow! That's what I'm talking about ! But my producer instincts are telling me to go for it. This is the legend of
the King of Requests. I've been asked to do too many things. Go take care of that first.

112660.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「グワッハハハ！:
Gwahahahaha! This is a legend! I was 90% sure you'd be okay with it, since you didn't give me any hard feelings about it. But my producer
instincts tell me it's just a passing fancy. So, please come back and take the job!

112661.勝手に入ると ラスターシャに\n怒られそうだ……。\n今 入るのは やめておこう:
Rastasha might get angry if I enter without
permission. I don't want to go in there now.

Okay? We're going to take out <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
in Glen West and <%nev_que_t_num0> of them.<open_irai><bw_break>

112664.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「おおっ！ 早か:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Oh! You were fast <pc>. From the
looks of it, you seem to have done exactly
what I asked you to do.

112665.「あれから ラスタのフキゲン伝説は\n 継続中でよ……ピリピリしっぱなしだぜ。\:
Since then, Rasta's fukigen legend is still going strong, and it's been a tense one at that. We'll just have to wait until the birth
of the legend of "Gokigen". So we'll have to put off the unveiling of the grown-up for a while longer. Let's take
this opportunity to raise the dancer's level to 15 or higher! That way, Rasta will approve of us!

112666.「お前ほどの逸材なら ラスタに\n 実力が認められるのも あっという間の\n マ:
If you're as good as you think you are, it won't be long before Rasta recognizes your abilities at Hat Hamwitch. So, please come
back again for a dancer position above level 15. Next time, I'll make sure you'll be recognized as a gappo!

112667.「おう いいところに来たな <pc>！\n お前とラスタの キズナが深まる また:
Oh, you've come to the right place, ! Here comes a unique opportunity for you and Rasta to deepen your relationship!
Can you go now?

112668.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「伝説級の度胸を:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>For a guy with legendary guts, you sure are
holding back. Well, if you need to prepare
yourself, I'll wait as long as I have to.

112669.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「グワッハハハ！:
Gwahahahaha! That's the reply I was hoping for. That's the way to go if you want to be a really strong dancer. On top of that, my luck
is legendary. Actually, I was just about to pick up Rasta from practice because he was coming home late. Nice timing to deepen our
kizuna, right? I understand that you're all fired up for the big show coming up, but if you push yourself too hard and end up hurting
yourself, it would be a complete disaster. Besides, it seems that grudge spirits are on the rise, and there are rumors that those
possessed by them are attacking dancers. So, let's go get him together! A quick "good job" after practice should deepen our kizuna. And
if we show him how much you've grown, we can kill two birds with one stone, right? Right? You'll come, right?

112670.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「グワッハハハ！:
Gwahahahaha! That's the way it should be. Let's get going. I think the training place is Daz Grotto. As you probably know, Daz Grotto
is just north of here in the Rangao Mountains. When you get there, head for the cavern in the back. I'll follow you when I'm done packing.
You go on ahead. I'm fast on my feet. I'll catch up with you soon.

112671.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「グワッハハハ！:
Gwahahahaha! It looks like you've even improved to the level of popularity. You're the legendary King of getting asked to do too
many jobs. I'll be waiting for you here. I'll be waiting for you here. Please hurry up!

112672.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「グワッハハハ！:
Gwahahahaha! I don't think so, but are you scared of Rasta? It's true that he's been a little unsociable lately. He seemed to be
interested in you for some reason. I think you should go see him.

112673.「おぅ <pc>！ 調子はどうでぃ？\n 一緒にラスタを 迎えにいく気になったか:
Oh <pc>! How's it going? You ready to
go pick up Rasta with me?

of here in the Rangao Mountains. When you get
there, head for the cavern in the back.<open_irai><bw_break>

114377.<close_irai>「オレは 支度をすませてから お前を\n 追いかけるから:
<close_irai>I'm going after you after I get ready. Go
ahead of me. I'm fast, you know. I'll catch up
with you soon.

112675.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「おう 戻ったか:
Oh, you're back. Well, I'm surprised! I never thought Rasta could do that legendary exorcism dance. I'll let him dance on stage too, just
for the sake of it! That would be legendary. Gwahahahaha! Hm? Are you hurt? That's right. That's what it's about, isn't it? I'd heard
that people possessed by grudge spirits were attacking dancer, but I never thought I'd see it right in front of my eyes. He wants to go
on to the next stage, but in his condition, I can't allow him to do so. But I want to buy his motivation. That's where a legendary
dancer comes in! Here. Here, take this. I'm just lending it to you! Take good care of it, will you?

112676.「それは 知る人ぞ知る 古のマジ強踊り子たちの\n 伝説的な活躍が記された 伝説:
It's a legendary book that chronicles the legendary exploits of some of the oldest and most powerful dancers known to man. That's how
I learned about the exorcism dance, too, right? There's a section in the book that talks about a leaf called Recovery Leaf that
can heal a dancer's injury in no time. Yes, that's it. The bookmark. It's the part where the dancer Gohkata, who is a really strong
dancer, puts his body on the line to pick up the Recovery Leaf. I want you to go look for the Recovery Leaf based on that description. I
want you to go and find the Recovery Leaf, just in time for the next stage. Then, when you're healed, Rasta will have no choice but
to recognize you for your legendary performance. Gwahahahahaha! I've got the plot down pat! You can check out the contents of
the book at "Old Dancer's Legend" under "Key Items" in the "items" section. Thanks for your help.

(Key Item)!<me 60>

112679.「そんで ケガが治れば その伝説的な活躍ぶりに\n ラスタも お前を 認めざるを:

120009.<close_irai>「本の内容は 『どうぐ』内の\n 『だいじなもの』にある:

112680.<pc>は\nナッチョスが しおりをはさんだ部分から\n『古き踊り子の伝説』を:
began reading "Old Dancer's Legend" from a bookmarked section by Nachos. The dancer, taking advantage of the
opportunity when a herd of caped capers went to the honey pond to eat, approached the bottomless pit with trepidation. He finds a
small rocky outcrop sticking out of the pit, with a little branch growing out of it, with fresh leaves. This was the Recovery Leaf,
which offers healing only to those who love to dance. As the crows soar over the peak of the round mountain, the dancer, resigned to the
dusk, moves herself to the bottomless pit.

112681.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「おおっ！ お前:
Oh, wow! That leaf you're holding! Could that be the Recovery Leaf? Gwahahahaha! It's scary to see you perform so well as expected! You're

112695.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「ガーン！ おいおい:

112696.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「ガガーン！ チラ見:

112697.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「というワケで ラス:
So Rasta left this letter behind and disappeared. He's got an important performance coming up. You know, the exorcism dance. I had
Rasta dance it onstage to see how well it would go over. Just when things were about to blow up, he came to see his former aikata. I

It'll only ruin the upcoming play. My unit plan with is ruined! And I'm bankrupt because I can't repay my debts! Our
legendary days are numbered. So, ! I need you to find Rasta and bring him back! Can you do that?

112698.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「グワッハハハ！:
Gwahahahaha! Thanks a lot! I owe you. Unfortunately, I have no idea where Rasta is headed. But you know what? Maybe that dancer,
I can't remember his name, but he's always dancing on the center street in Gartlant Castle Town, and he's Rasta's friend. He might
know something. You can start looking into him. This is the biggest crisis in my career as a producer. Bring him back with all your
might, will you?

112699.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「グワッハハハ！:

114375.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「なぁにぃぃっ！？:

to King Ladis Island. If you dance on the stage farthest from the Wisdom among the nine small stages scattered in the northern part of

112749.「まぁ お前といえども 世界のステージじゃ\n いろいろ つれぇこともあるだろう:

112750.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「う～ん。それに:

112751.「あは！ そうよね。いくらなんでもそれは……。\n でも それにしたって この心:

112752.「やっぱり！？ じつは さっき……\n 見たことも踊ったこともない 踊りが\n:

to glow a little! What was that all about? Is it some kind of forbidden dance developed by a mysterious organization? What's so funny is
that it's pretty cool. It's a little scary, but I think I'm going to aim for the world with that forbidden dance!

52757.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「我が求めるは:

Sunset Meadow, around Ruined Village, just before Cursed Land.

may already know, we Holy Messengers serve the Goddess Six Saints, and our role is to raise good adventurers To a Higher Level. Now, let
us perform the ritual in front of the River of Light. Take this. This is the Red Goddess Gem, a precious jewel.
